string-array.name: muerte
string-array.item: will go jogging as usual, and after the first six meters you will be run over by a trycicle at your
will die on Halloween, when you will be scared by an assassin clown and you have a heart attack at your
one day you will turn on the TV, Salvame will be on, and you will die traumatized at your
will get up on the forest after a crazy night and, still drunk, you will walk into the fog and fall off a cliff at your
